description: Alister, otherwise known as Alice, is the eight-highest ranking maid of the Nogizaka family, and is in charge of security. She looks like a grade school student, and is a blond Caucasian (most likely German, since she once utters "Bruder", which conveys the same meaning as Mika`s "Onii-san", when addressing Yuuto). She rarely speaks (being not yet skilled in Japanese), and normally converses with others via an array of nods and head-shakes to express her meanings.
name: Alistia Rein
